details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم صل وسلم على نبينا محمد
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَى نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ
details.transliteration: Allahumma salli wa sallim 'alaa nabiyyinaa Muhammadin
details.translations: O Allaah, send prayers and peace upon our Prophet Muhammad.
details.bottom: The Prophet saw said: "Who recites blessings upon me 10 times in the morning and 10 times in the evening will obtain my intercession on the Day of Resurrection".

pageTitle: Gain Prophet saw's intercession on the Day of Judgment
